General.Name: Ramco Industries Limited
General.Description: Ramco Industries Limited engages in the building products, textiles, and power generation businesses in India. The company manufactures fiber cement sheets and calcium silicate boards; industrial roofing sheets; high density boards; non-cementitious lightweight calcium silicate ceiling tiles; accessories, such as G.I channels, studs, screws, jointing compound, fibre tape, wool mat, rawl plug, self-drilling and taping screws, and fibre tape mesh; grid ceiling-accessories, including pre coated wall angle, level clip, pre coated main "T' frame, and pre coated cross main "T' frame; and metal framing products. It also provides design and material consultancy, project execution, site quality assurance, and dry construction methods training services. In addition, the company engages in sale of electricity generated from windmills. Ramco Industries Limited was incorporated in 1965 and is based in Chennai, India.
